title: Karnataka Governor assents to ordinance on anti-conversion law - The News Minute
content:
1. Karnataka Governor assents to ordinance on anti-conversion law  The News Minute
  2. Anti-conversion ordinance becomes law in Karnataka as Governor gives nod  Deccan Herald
  3. Showdown Over Anti-Conversion Ordinance In Karnataka, Christian Leaders Demand Scrapping Of Bill  India Today
  4. Anti-conversion ordinance becomes law in Karnataka as Governor gives assent  Daijiworld.com
  5. Latest News: Karnataka governor gives assent to anti-conversion ordinance  Times of India
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Karnataka Governor Thawar Chand Gehlot on Tuesday, May 17, gave his assent and promulgated the ordinance brought in by the BJP government on the controversial Karnataka Protection of Right to Freedom of Religion Bill, 2021 popularly known as the anti-conversion Bill. The ordinance was sent to the Governor's approval by the ruling BJP after a recent cabinet decision. The ordinance was notified immediately by the government.
